title: Inception
long_description: A thief who enters the dreams of others is given the chance to have his past crimes forgiven, provided he can successfully implant an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: The Dark Knight
long_description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham City into anarchy, forcing the superhero to confront his greatest fear.

title: Interstellar
long_description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
long_description: A hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Gladiator
short_description: A tale of revenge and honor.
long_description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
long_description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
long_description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
long_description: A young hobbit sets out on a quest to destroy a powerful ring with the help of a fellowship of companions.

title: Forrest Gump
short_description: Life is like a box of chocolates.
long_description: The story of an intellectually disabled man's life and his accidental involvement in some of the defining events of the late 20th century.

title: Fight Club
short_description: First rule: You do not talk about Fight Club.
long_description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Inglourious Basterds
short_description: A tale of vengeance and bravery.
long_description: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as 'The Basterds' engage in targeted acts of retribution against the Third Reich.

title: The Prestige
short_description: A rivalry of magic and obsession.
long_description: Two rival magicians compete to create the ultimate stage illusion, leading to dangerous consequences.

title: Titanic
long_description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Jurassic Park
long_description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: The Lion King
short_description: A king's journey to reclaim his throne.
long_description: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity, learning lessons of responsibility and bravery along the way.

title: Back to the Future
long_description: A teenager travels back in time to meet his parents in high school, accidentally changing history in the process.

title: The Terminator
long_description: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill a woman whose son will lead humanity in a war against machines.

title: The Godfather
short_description: The rise of a mafia family.
long_description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather: Part II
short_description: The continuing saga of the Corleone family.
long_description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed, while his son Michael expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
short_description: The beginning of a galactic saga.
long_description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.
